name: Walking Lunge
setup: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
Engage core and maintain upright posture
Hands on hips or swinging naturally
steps: Lower until both knees are at 90°
Push through front heel to step up and forward
Bring back leg through to next lunge
Continue alternating legs while moving forward
safety: Ensure clear path. Focus on control over speed. Stop if balance becomes compromised.

prescriptionHints.load: Bodyweight to start, add load as appropriate
prescriptionHints.notes: Dynamic movement requiring balance and coordination

joints.notes: Requires good balance and ankle mobility. Control each step position.
